function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Evaporation and dispersion of respiratory droplets","Impact":"Spread of respiratory diseases","Mitigation":"Enhanced ventilation, use of face masks, and physical distancing","Technologies":"Air purifiers, ventilation systems, and UV germicidal irradiation","People":"Public in enclosed spaces, healthcare workers, and individuals in close proximity","Owner":"Government, building managers, and individuals"},{"Description":"Spread of infectious bioaerosols from vomit and feces","Impact":"Increased risk of spreading diseases such as SARS, E. coli, and meningitis","Mitigation":"Enhanced sanitation and disinfection, use of protective equipment, and proper waste management","Technologies":"Disinfectants, UV-C light sterilization, and waste treatment systems","People":"Sanitation workers, public in shared spaces, and healthcare workers","Owner":"Government, building managers, and sanitation companies"}]}
